data.text: @Liptonators No it’s a indemic now so that mean it’s like the flu it’s normal
@Liptonators Keep wearing it because vaccinated or not you can still catch it and that ish is not something to play with 😬
@loganmaraj2 Yeah I’ll wear mines bc it just made no sense to me as to why we don’t have to wear masks if there are still rising cases.
@Liptonators oooou girl ummm keep yours on for a little chile lmao , but cases is gonna rise but deaths will be minimum unlike 2020

@2shortandconfu2 Okay. Cause I’m like “if we supposedly have rising cases why are we taking the masks off?”💀 imma still wear mines but even yesterday a yt man came up to me as soon as I entired the building saying “You know you don’t have to wear those anymore unless you choose to?” I said “ok”

@Liptonators I think they're lifting those mandates to get people back to work vaccinated or unvaccinated, and I think those lax mandates are supposed to entice them to come back out, that's just my personal opinion

@loganmaraj2 Idk since most ppl aren’t vaccinated here. And where I work it was never mandatory for anyone to get vaccinated and last I heard we had rising cases so I’m confused. https://t.co/KXBgEbzAjI

@2shortandconfu2 So why they telling ppl they don’t got to wear masks no more? I work in a big factory plant with more than 1000+ workers daily only a few ppl had their mask on and the majority isn’t vaccinated. https://t.co/wX9YKNCjRr

@Liptonators nah it’s here forever but  it’s just the severity of covid has gone down since alot is vaccinated, so it’s gonna turn into the flu & affects us, also how it’s bad for certain people etc 😗… so yeah hopefully we get some normalcy
